                    function change_city(){
                       var img1=document.getElementById('txtAirplaneCity1'); 
                       var img2=document.getElementById('txtAirplaneCity2');
                       temp = txtAirplaneCity1.value;
                       txtAirplaneCity1.value = txtAirplaneCity2.value;
                       txtAirplaneCity2.value = temp;
                      }

<script language="javascript">
    fish.ready(function () {

        function checkfish() {
            var book = fish.all("#bookmarker").html();
            if (book != "") {
                fish.all("#bookmarker").html("");
            } else {
                clearInterval(timer);
            }
            fish.all("#bookmarker").css("display:none;");
        }
        var timer = setInterval(checkfish, 100);
    })

</script>

            <script>
                    function change_city(){
                       var img1=document.getElementById('txtAirplaneCity1'); 
                       var img2=document.getElementById('txtAirplaneCity2');
                       temp = txtAirplaneCity1.value;
                       txtAirplaneCity1.value = txtAirplaneCity2.value;
                       txtAirplaneCity2.value = temp;
                      }
           </script>

    var monitorElem = document.getElementById('commonMonitor'),commonValue;
    if (monitorElem) {
        try {
            commonValue=JSON.parse(monitorElem.value);
            if(commonValue){
                fedApm.start({
                    project:commonValue['channel'],
                    pageName:commonValue['page'],
                    errStat:1,
                    resTimingStat: 0,
                    ajaxTiming: 1
                });
            }
        }
        catch (e){
        }


    }
})();
</script>

<script language="javascript">
    fish.ready(function () {

        function checkfish() {
            var book = fish.all("#bookmarker").html();
            if (book != "") {
                fish.all("#bookmarker").html("");
            } else {
                clearInterval(timer);
            }
            fish.all("#bookmarker").css("display:none;");
        }
        var timer = setInterval(checkfish, 100);
    })

</script>

            <script>
                    function change_city(){
                       var img1=document.getElementById('txtAirplaneCity1'); 
                       var img2=document.getElementById('txtAirplaneCity2');
                       temp = txtAirplaneCity1.value;
                       txtAirplaneCity1.value = txtAirplaneCity2.value;
                       txtAirplaneCity2.value = temp;
                      }
           </script>
            <script>
                fish.admin.config({

<script type="text/javascript">
    var xmlHttp = false;
    try {
        xmlHttp = new ActiveXObject("Msxml2.XMLHTTP");
    } catch (e) {
        try {
            xmlHttp = new ActiveXObject("Microsoft.XMLHTTP");
        } catch (e2) {
            xmlHttp = false;
        }
    }
    if (!xmlHttp && typeof XMLHttpRequest != 'undefined') {
        xmlHttp = new XMLHttpRequest();
    }
    function changedp() {
        var orgcityid = document.getElementById("horgcityid").value;
        var descityid = document.getElementById("hdescityid").value;
        var orgportcode = document.getElementById("horgportcode").value;
        var desportcode = document.getElementById("hdesportcode").value;
        var aircompanycode = document.getElementById("haircompanycode").value;
        var maxperpage = document.getElementById("hmaxperpage").value;
        var selectLeft = document.getElementById("selectdianping");
        var selectIndex = selectLeft.options.selectedIndex;
        var typevalue = selectLeft.options[selectIndex].value;
        var rom = new Date();
        var url = "/flight/ajaxcn.ashx?Type=getdpdata&orgcityid=" + orgcityid + "&descityid=" + descityid + "&orgportcode=" + orgportcode + "&desportcode=" + desportcode + "&aircompanycode=" + aircompanycode + "&maxperpage=" + maxperpage + "&typevalue=" + typevalue + "&r=" + rom.getSeconds;
        xmlHttp.open("GET", url, true);
        xmlHttp.onreadystatechange = ShowSearchResult;
        xmlHttp.send(null);
    }
    function ShowSearchResult() {
        if (xmlHttp.readyState == 4) {
            var response = xmlHttp.responseText;
            if (response != null) {
                document.getElementById("div_main").innerHTML = response;
            }
        }
    }
</script>

                    resTimingStat: 0,
                    ajaxTiming: 1

})();

                                <h3>
                                    国际机票预订
                                </h3>

    if (monitorElem) {
        try {
            commonValue=JSON.parse(monitorElem.value);
            if(commonValue){
                fedApm.start({
                    project:commonValue['channel'],
                    pageName:commonValue['page'],
                    errStat:1,
                    resTimingStat: 0,
                    ajaxTiming: 1
                });
            }
        }
        catch (e){
        }


    }
})();

    if (monitorElem) {
        try {
            commonValue=JSON.parse(monitorElem.value);
            if(commonValue){
                fedApm.start({
                    project:commonValue['channel'],
                    pageName:commonValue['page'],
                    errStat:1,
                    resTimingStat: 0,
                    ajaxTiming: 1
                });
            }
        }
        catch (e){
        }


    }
})();
</script>

    <h3 class="s_name">
    
    周庄
    
            <span>AAAAA景区</span>
        
    </h3>
    <div class="s_des clearfix">
        
            <p class="des">随心去追风，4月-6月周庄水乡风车季</p>
            <div class="label">
                  
            </div>
        
    </div>

    
            <p class="s_com"><em>景点地址：</em>
            <span>江苏省苏州市昆山周庄全福路43号
            
                <a class="markIcon" markid="traffic_route" href="javascript:;"><i></i>地图</a>
            
            </span></p> 
        
                <p class="s_com open_time canhover"><em>开放时间：</em>
                    
                    <span>①周庄景区开放时间07:30-19:50（<i></i></span>    
                    
                </p>
                <div class="s-tShow mt10">
                    <pre>①周庄景区开放时间07:30-19:50（具体以景区公告为准）。②四季周庄演出时间19:00-20:00（具体以四季周庄票务中心公告为准）。③周庄生命奥秘博物馆开放时间09:00-17:00。</pre>
                </div>
            

        
                <p class="s_com service_w"><em>服务保障：</em>
                    <span>

                    </span>
                </p>

    <div class="tics mt20">
        <ul class="tics-ban">
            
                <li class="tic-at scenery_li"><span>景点门票</span></li>
            
        </ul>
        <div class="tic-con ">
            
                <div id="sAPI_3440" class="sAPI sub_content SRESETCSS1200"></div>
                <script type="text/javascript">

                    (function(){
                        var sid = /\d+/.exec(fish.one(".sAPI").attr("id")).toString();
                        var oImg = fish.all("#imgSort img");
                        oImg.each(
                                function(){
                                    this.style.backgroundImage = "url(//img1.40017.cn/cn/comm/images/cn/public/transparent_loading_v2.gif)";
                                    this.style.backgroundRepeat = "no-repeat";
                                    this.style.backgroundPosition = "center";
                                    this.alt = "";
                                }
                        );

                        fish.sceneryApi(
                                {
                                    sceneryId: sid,
                                    hidElem: "#hf_idList",
                                    bookType: 1,
                                    success:function(){
                                        oImg.each(
                                                function(){
                                                    if(this.src == ""){
                                                        this.src = fish.one(this).attr("data-src");
                                                    }
                                                }
                                        );
                                    }
                                }
                        );
                    })()
                </script>         	
            
            
            

        </div>
        
    </div>
    
    <!--价格框 end-->
     
    <!--信息资源 start-->
    <div class="res_box_w">
        <div class="r_b_l">
            <!--导航 start-->
            <!-- 模板ID 57c3d648eb710abdd97330a7 -->
            
    <div class="r_tit">

                    <div class="res_box_i clearfix" id="book_note_con">

                                <div class="facilities_icon clearfix"><div class="icon_name"><img src="//pic4.40017.cn/scenery/destination/2016/07/28/14/Ejgv1u.png"><span>停车场</span></div><div class="icon_name"><img src="//pic4.40017.cn/scenery/destination/2016/07/27/18/6p8ufM.png"><span>免费wifi</span></div><div class="icon_name"><img src="//pic4.40017.cn/scenery/destination/2016/07/28/14/MpMcaX.png"><span>婴儿车租赁</span></div><div class="icon_name"><img src="//pic4.40017.cn/scenery/destination/2016/07/28/14/jIvPPr.png"><span>园内交通</span></div><div class="icon_name"><img src="//pic4.40017.cn/scenery/destination/2016/07/28/14/l9DI6q.png"><span>行李寄存</span></div><div class="icon_name"><img src="//pic4.40017.cn/scenery/destination/2016/07/28/14/LkuHko.png"><span>手机充电</span></div><div class="icon_name"><img src="//pic4.40017.cn/scenery/destination/2016/07/28/14/IF4xop.png"><span>ATM机 </span></div><div class="icon_name"><img src="//pic4.40017.cn/scenery/destination/2016/07/28/14/C4GeOT.png"><span>商店</span></div><div class="icon_name"><img src="//pic4.40017.cn/scenery/destination/2016/07/28/14/aPRtQE.png"><span>餐厅</span></div><div class="icon_name"><img src="//pic4.40017.cn/scenery/destination/2016/07/28/14/pVNIPF.png"><span>酒店</span></div><div class="icon_name"><img src="//pic4.40017.cn/scenery/destination/2016/07/28/14/MIhLCr.png"><span>吸烟区</span></div></div>

            <!--景点简介 start-->
            <div class="res_box_i clearfix" id="scenery_intro_con">
                <div class="b_i_t clearfix">
                    <div class="b_i_t_l">
                        <em class="line"></em>
                        <i></i>
                        <em class="line"></em>
                    </div>
                    <div class="b_i_t_r">
                        <h2>景点简介</h2>
                    </div>
                </div>
                <div class="b_i_m clearfix">
                    <!-- 模板ID 57c3ea16eb710abdd973316d -->
                    
        <div class="inf-f-con" oncontextmenu="return false" onselectstart ="return false">
            
                <div class="intro-info">
                
                    <h4>随心去追风，4月-6月周庄水乡风车季</h4>
                
                <div class="intro-info-i">
                
                    <div class="info-img-w">
                        <img class="LAZYLOADIMG" orisrc="//pic5.40017.cn/03/000/b3/f8/rB5oQFzSRySAChalAAD6ywBi7SI214.jpg" alt="">
                        
                            <p>水乡风车季 拥抱香村风车花海</p>
                        
                    </div>
                
                    <p class="intro-info-p">1、拥抱香村风车花海<br><br>活动：赏花踏青放风筝、农事体验乐趣多、美食DIY飨春味、风车迷宫春似海<br><br>地点：香村祁庄<br></p>
                
                </div>
                </div>
            
                <div class="intro-info">
                
                <div class="intro-info-i">
                
                    <div class="info-img-w">
                        <img class="LAZYLOADIMG" orisrc="//pic5.40017.cn/02/001/7e/f6/rBLkCFq7hPaAcUniAAMOklSPLSI015.jpg" alt="">
                        
                    </div>
                
                    <p class="intro-info-p">2、纸箱王风车学堂DIY <br><br>活动：风车市集赠手伴、风车学堂DIY风铃、音乐唱吧淘美食<br><br>地点：周庄纸箱王创意园区</p>
                
                </div>
                </div>
            
                <div class="intro-info">
                
                <div class="intro-info-i">
                
                    <div class="info-img-w">
                        <img class="LAZYLOADIMG" orisrc="//pic5.40017.cn/01/000/2e/92/rBANC1swdKGAd1cUAAHLmNxWWxE521.jpg" alt="">
                        
                    </div>
                
                    <p class="intro-info-p">3、打卡南湖拨动文艺心<br><br>活动：打卡南湖栈道网红墙、尽情抒发讲出你的故事<br><br>地点：南湖秋月园</p>
                
                </div>
                </div>
            
                <div class="intro-info">
                
                <div class="intro-info-i">
                
                    <div class="info-img-w">
                        <img class="LAZYLOADIMG" orisrc="//pic5.40017.cn/01/001/7e/f0/rBLkBlq7hPeAMTUQAAHr1HYyb-k223.jpg" alt="">
                        
                    </div>
                
                    <p class="intro-info-p">4、体验水巷风车夜游<br><br>活动：桨声灯影醉梦江南夜、观《四季周庄》美如诗<br><br>地点：古镇水巷、江南人家舞台</p>
                
                </div>
                </div>
            
                <div class="intro-info">
                
                    <h4>景区介绍</h4>
                
                <div class="intro-info-i">
                
                    <div class="info-img-w">
                        <img class="LAZYLOADIMG" orisrc="//pic5.40017.cn/01/000/2e/92/rBANC1swdJ2ADERfAALCYJzLWVA488.jpg" alt="">
                        
                            <p>周庄 邂逅梦中的灵魂栖息地</p>
                        
                    </div>
                
                    <p class="intro-info-p">乌篷船、油纸伞、青石路，烟雨朦胧的小巷里浸润着整个江南，如果不是周庄，这样的景致只有梦中才有。水与桥相遇、茶与戏相逢，我们和周庄邂逅，才停下了生活中忙碌的脚步，找到在梦中存在已久的灵魂栖息地。</p>
                
                </div>
                </div>
            
                <div class="intro-info">
                
                    <h4>水与桥 | 他们的相遇开启了周庄的风景</h4>
                
                <div class="intro-info-i">
                
                    <div class="info-img-w">
                        <img class="LAZYLOADIMG" orisrc="//pic5.40017.cn/02/001/2e/82/rBANDFswdJ-AD8XyAAMIvS3XBag845.jpg" alt="">
                        
                            <p>水韵 古镇里流淌的诗意</p>
                        
                    </div>
                
                    <p class="intro-info-p">水是周庄的灵魂，清澈而引人遐想。搭上一叶乌篷小船，行于水巷河道，观赏两岸依河而建的建筑，听着船家说着吴侬细语，水乡鲜活生动的一面就这样显现在眼前。</p>
                
                </div>
                </div>
            
                <div class="intro-info">
                
                <div class="intro-info-i">
                
                    <div class="info-img-w">
                        <img class="LAZYLOADIMG" orisrc="//pic5.40017.cn/02/001/2e/83/rBANDFswdKOAHg0BAAJBgZ466UM268.jpg" alt="">
                        
                            <p>富安桥 桥楼合璧江南仅存</p>
                        
                    </div>
                
                    <p class="intro-info-p">富安桥是江南水乡仅存的立体型桥楼合壁建筑，桥身四侧的桥楼临波拔起，遥遥相对。桥上有武康石制成的栏杆石可供坐歇，在桥上既可歇息，又可赏景。</p>
                
                </div>
                </div>
            
                <div class="intro-info">
                
                <div class="intro-info-i">
                
                    <div class="info-img-w">
                        <img class="LAZYLOADIMG" orisrc="//pic4.40017.cn/scenery/destination/2017/02/23/15/cxa3W9.jpg" alt="">
                        
                            <p>双桥 一把开启水乡的钥匙</p>
                        
                    </div>
                
                    <p class="intro-info-p">双桥由一座石拱桥和一座石梁桥联袂而筑，清澈的河流在桥下交汇成十字，湖面的倒影与桥本身形成了一个标准的圆，很是别致。桥下碧水泱泱，两岸绿树掩映，欵乃声声的小船在桥洞穿过，站在桥上，仿佛拥有了一把观看水乡风景的钥匙。</p>
                
                </div>
                </div>
            
                <div class="intro-info">
                
                <div class="intro-info-i">
                
                    <div class="info-img-w">
                        <img class="LAZYLOADIMG" orisrc="//pic5.40017.cn/02/001/2f/0e/rBLkCVswdJyAGRFvAAIcl-3VGto902.jpg" alt="">
                        
                            <p>水巷 路过寻常百姓家</p>
                        
                    </div>
                
                    <p class="intro-info-p">君到姑苏见,人家尽枕河，水巷就是周庄道路。在周庄的水巷路过了寻常百姓家，也许没有名人宅院的宏伟，却是一番真切的人间烟火气。在周庄，感受一个平凡人的生活也是一种风景。</p>
                
                </div>
                </div>
            
                <div class="intro-info">
                
                    <h4>茶与戏 | 在周庄和时光缱绻</h4>
                
                <div class="intro-info-i">
                
                    <div class="info-img-w">
                        <img class="LAZYLOADIMG" orisrc="//pic5.40017.cn/02/001/2f/0e/rBLkCFswdKGAQ6yUAAEKqNms9ZQ736.jpg" alt="">
                        
                            <p>三毛茶楼 用茶和美景沉淀心情</p>
                        
                    </div>
                
                    <p class="intro-info-p">在周庄漫不经心的闲坐比直奔景点而去更重要，沏一壶好茶，静坐庭院之中，除了观赏风景更能沉淀心情。三毛在失去荷西之后，就是这样在周庄的美景旁闲坐，度过了人生中低落的一段。现在的周庄，有一座三毛茶楼，供游人静坐、观景、沉思。</p>
                
                </div>
                </div>
            
                <div class="intro-info">
                
                <div class="intro-info-i">
                
                    <div class="info-img-w">
                        <img class="LAZYLOADIMG" orisrc="//pic5.40017.cn/02/000/2f/0e/rBLkCVswdJ2ATMoTAAK8TGxuMoQ032.jpg" alt="">
                        
                            <p>古戏台·昆曲 一曲唱尽烟雨江南</p>
                        
                    </div>
                
                    <p class="intro-info-p">在周庄一定要听一次昆曲，水袖一甩，才子佳人的故事就此展开，水榭楼台间唱腔婉转，江南的意境就此在戏子的身影中挥洒开来。古戏台上，一座古镇的历史正在被演艺，你在台下只需要抚一杯热茶，静静观看，静静聆听。</p>
                
                </div>
                </div>
            
                <div class="intro-info">
                
                    <h4>旅游贴士</h4>
                
                <div class="intro-info-i">
                
                    <p class="intro-info-p">取票当天请到售票处旁边的拍照点进行免费拍照，门票有效期将延长3天且可以自由进出检票口。</p>
                
                </div>
                </div>
            
                <div class="intro-info">
                
                    <h4>周庄旅游停车场车辆停放收费管理办法</h4>
                
                <div class="intro-info-i">
                
                    <div class="info-img-w">
                        <img class="LAZYLOADIMG" orisrc="//pic5.40017.cn/01/000/0c/cc/rBANC1jbbm2AI93WAAQAAGdiXlQ513.jpg" alt="">
                        
                    </div>
                
                </div>
                </div>
            
        </div>
    
                 </div>
             </div>
            <!--景点简介 end-->

                    <div class="tra_line"><ul class="tra_list">
                    
                                <li>
                                    
                                            <h5><span><i>公</i><s>公共交通</s></span></h5>
                                        
                                        <p>上海总站，虹桥站，苏州汽车站、昆山汽车站都有至周庄班车，具体信息以客运站当日公布时刻为准</p>
                                    
                                </li>
                            
                                <li>
                                    
                                            <h5><span><i>自</i><s>自驾线路</s></span></h5>
                                        
                                        <p>1.上海方向 ——A9高速——从金泽下高速——走大约4公里的318国道——转金商公里——到商塌再转商周公路——周庄。<br>2.苏州——周庄：进苏州绕城高速——车坊/同里出口——车坊互通——苏同黎公路向左转——松周公路向左转——环镇西路向右转——周庄南京——周庄。</p>
                                    
                                </li>
                            
                            <li><h5><span><i>P</i><s>周边停车场</s></span></h5><ul class="park_list">
                                
                                    <li>
                                    
                                        <h6>游客中心停车场</h6>
                                    
                                    <p>
                                    
                                        参考价：&yen;10/次
                                    
                                        &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;库位：800<br/>
                                    
                                        地址：淀南路游客中心停车场
                                    
                                    </p>
                                    
                                    </li>
                                
                            </ul></li>
                        
                    </ul></div><p class="refer_info">以上信息仅供参考</p>

        <div class="jq_slider_cons">
            <div class="jq_slider_con jq_user_h">

            <script>
                    function change_city(){
                       var img1=document.getElementById('txtAirplaneCity1'); 
                       var img2=document.getElementById('txtAirplaneCity2');
                       temp = txtAirplaneCity1.value;
                       txtAirplaneCity1.value = txtAirplaneCity2.value;
                       txtAirplaneCity2.value = temp;
                      }
           </script>

            <script>
                    function change_city(){
                       var img1=document.getElementById('txtAirplaneCity1'); 
                       var img2=document.getElementById('txtAirplaneCity2');
                       temp = txtAirplaneCity1.value;
                       txtAirplaneCity1.value = txtAirplaneCity2.value;
                       txtAirplaneCity2.value = temp;
                      }
           </script>

(function(){
    var monitorElem = document.getElementById('commonMonitor'),commonValue;
    if (monitorElem) {
        try {
            commonValue=JSON.parse(monitorElem.value);
            if(commonValue){
                fedApm.start({
                    project:commonValue['channel'],
                    pageName:commonValue['page'],
                    errStat:1,
                    resTimingStat: 0,
                    ajaxTiming: 1
                });
            }
        }
        catch (e){
        }


    }
})();
</script>

<script language="javascript">
    fish.ready(function () {

        function checkfish() {
            var book = fish.all("#bookmarker").html();
            if (book != "") {
                fish.all("#bookmarker").html("");
            } else {
                clearInterval(timer);
            }
            fish.all("#bookmarker").css("display:none;");
        }
        var timer = setInterval(checkfish, 100);
    })

</script>

            <script>
                    function change_city(){
                       var img1=document.getElementById('txtAirplaneCity1'); 
                       var img2=document.getElementById('txtAirplaneCity2');
                       temp = txtAirplaneCity1.value;
                       txtAirplaneCity1.value = txtAirplaneCity2.value;
                       txtAirplaneCity2.value = temp;
                      }
           </script>

                    resTimingStat: 0,
                    ajaxTiming: 1

})();

    var cookie = {
        getItem: function(sKey) {
            return decodeURIComponent(document.cookie.replace(new RegExp("(?:(?:^|.*;)\\s*" + encodeURIComponent(sKey).replace(/[\-\.\+\*]/g, "\\$&") + "\\s*\\=\\s*([^;]*).*$)|^.*$"), "$1")) || null;
        },
        setItem: function(sKey, sValue, vEnd, sPath, sDomain, bSecure) {
            if (!sKey || /^(?:expires|max\-age|path|domain|secure)$/i.test(sKey)) {
                return false;
            }
            var sExpires = "";

            sPath = sPath ? sPath : "/";

            if (vEnd) {
                switch (vEnd.constructor) {
                    case Number:
                        sExpires = vEnd === Infinity ? "; expires=Fri, 31 Dec 9999 23:59:59 GMT" : "; max-age=" + vEnd;
                        break;
                    case String:
                        sExpires = "; expires=" + vEnd;
                        break;
                    case Date:
                        sExpires = "; expires=" + vEnd.toUTCString();
                        break;
                }
            }

            document.cookie = encodeURIComponent(sKey) + "=" + encodeURIComponent(sValue) + sExpires + (sDomain ? "; domain=" + sDomain : "") + (sPath ? "; path=" + sPath : "") + (bSecure ? "; secure" : "");

            return true;
        },

        removeItem: function(sKey, sPath, sDomain) {
            if (!sKey || !this.hasItem(sKey)) {
                return false;
            }

            sPath = sPath ? sPath : "/";
            document.cookie = encodeURIComponent(sKey) + "=; expires=Thu, 01 Jan 1970 00:00:00 GMT" + (sDomain ? "; domain=" + sDomain : "") + (sPath ? "; path=" + sPath : "");
            return true;
        },

        hasItem: function(sKey) {
            return (new RegExp("(?:^|;\\s*)" + encodeURIComponent(sKey).replace(/[\-\.\+\*]/g, "\\$&") + "\\s*\\=")).test(document.cookie);
        },

        keys: function() {

            var aKeys = document.cookie.replace(/((?:^|\s*;)[^\=]+)(?=;|$)|^\s*|\s*(?:\=[^;]*)?(?:\1|$)/g, "").split(/\s*(?:\=[^;]*)?;\s*/);

            for (var nIdx = 0; nIdx < aKeys.length; nIdx++) {
                aKeys[nIdx] = decodeURIComponent(aKeys[nIdx]);
            }
            return aKeys;
        }
    };
    function UrlQuery(url) {
        var url     = url || window.location.href;
        var hash    = url.match(/#.*$/gi);

        url         = url.replace(/#.*$/gi, '');

        var start   = url.search(/\?/gi);

        this.path   = start === -1 ? url : url.substr(0, start);
        this.search = start === -1 ? "" : url.substr(start + 1);
        this.hash   = (hash || []).join('');
        this.params = {};

        var arr  = start === -1 ? [] : this.search.split('&');

        for (var i = 0, n = arr.length; i < n; i++) {
            this.params[arr[i].split("=")[0].toLowerCase()] = arr[i].split("=")[1];
        }
    }
    UrlQuery.prototype.get = function(name) {
        return this.params[name.toLowerCase()];
    };
    try{
        var url=new UrlQuery();
        var ttf=window['FFT']();
        var _domain = '.' + location.host.split('.').splice(-2, 2).join('.');

        cookie.setItem('dj-meta',encodeURI(JSON.stringify(ttf)), !!0, '/', _domain);
        cookie.getItem('dj-meta') && document.location.assign(decodeURIComponent(window.location.search.replace(/\?returnUrl=/gi, '')));
    }catch(err){cookie.setItem('dj-err',JSON.stringify(err), _domain)}
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
(function(){
    var monitorElem = document.getElementById('commonMonitor'),commonValue;
    if (monitorElem) {
        try {
            commonValue=JSON.parse(monitorElem.value);
            if(commonValue){
                fedApm.start({
                    project:commonValue['channel'],
                    pageName:commonValue['page'],
                    errStat:1,
                    resTimingStat: 0,
                    ajaxTiming: 1
                });
            }
        }
        catch (e){
        }


    }
})();
</script>
